DOC.brief_title: Study FK788 Subjects With Chronic Hepatitis C Virus Infection
DOC.detailed_description: This multi-center , randomize , investigator subject blind , placebo-controlled eight week study , include four week treatment period four week follow-up period . Three cohort HCV positive subject study sequential manner .
DOC.criteria: The following criterion brief summary Criterion require trial participation . Inclusion Criteria Has chronic hepatitis C virus infection previously receive least three month treatment approve therapy fail respond , relapse tolerate therapy Has positive HCV RNA RTPCR Has abnormal ALT level ( least 2 X ULN ) Has liver biopsy within past 2 year consistent chronic hepatitis , evidence nonalcoholic steatohepatitis cirrhosis , least mild inflammation Has normal liver function indicate : PT = < 2 sec . prolong compare ULN , Albumin > = 3.5 g/dL , Total bilirubin = < 1.5 mg/dL ANA titer = < 1:160 Exclusion Criteria Has positive skin test tuberculosis Has ALT value > = 300 IU/L Has abnormal hematological parameter indicate : ANC < 1500/mm3 Platelets < 100,000/mm3 Has creatinine > 1.5 X ULN AFP > 50 ng/mL evidence hepatocellular carcinoma ultrasound Is carrier hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) , positive HIV1 and/or HIV2 antibody
